Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs help - Print this help message. Step 1: Add Streamroot plugin Bash 1 2 3 #!/bin/bash echo "Hello world!" C 1 2 3 4 #include <stdio.h> int main ( void ) { printf ( "Hello world! \n " ); } C++ 1 2 3 4 5 6 #include <iostream> int main () { std :: cout << "Hello world!" << std :: endl ; return 0 ; } C# 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 using System ; class Program { static void Main ( string [] args ) { Console . WriteLine ( "Hello world!" ); } } !/usr/bin/python import tensorflow as tf
